title: 246. Andy & DJ CTI: White House's Ulterior Motive, Poop Criminal Cut Loose & Melinda Gates Speaks
itunes:title: 246. Andy & DJ CTI: White House's Ulterior Motive, Poop Criminal Cut Loose & Melinda Gates Speaks
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss the White House asking Congress for $10 Billion in aid for Ukraine with an additional $22.5 Million for Covid-19 treatments, vaccines & tests, the Bronx criminal who was cut loose after committing a hate crime using his own poop, and Melinda Gates speaking out about the relationship between ex-husband Bill Gates and convicted child sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein as one of contributing factors for their divorce.
